venue.name: New Bedford National Whaling Historical Park

item.description:
The second Thursday of every month New Bedford has an evening of entertainment sponsored by AHA! (art, history, and architecture). I have gone many times and it's always fun. The theme for this evening, May 14, is NB Seen.

Here is the AHA! website: http://www.ahanewbedf...

In the past we have all met at the visitor center at 6 and then gone on from there as one large group. However, I am giving a final until 6 and so we're going to change things up a bit. Where you can meet us:
1) At 6pm Charlie will meet people at the visitor center. He will depart with anyone who is there by 6:15.
2) At 7pm I will be at the Zeiterion theater for the UMass Dartmouth and Kekeli African Dance and Drumming Ensemble. Their performance is 7:15-8:15.
3) At 8:30 we will head over to Freestone's for dinner. I believe they have music starting at 9 or so, which will also be nice.

Please indicate in your RSVP where you will join the group (visitor center, Zeiterion, Freestone's).

You can park for free on the street after 6, or if you decide to come much earlier just bring a couple quarters for the meters. I'll send out my cell number and Charlie's number the day before to Yes responders.

Come out for a night of free entertainment! Hope to see you there. This is a joint event with The South Shore 30+ Singles Meetup and WINGS. Please RSVP on just one site.
item.how_to_find_us: Charlie will meet people at the visitor center; I will catch up after my final

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: AHA! night in New Bedford
